description.english: You could not stop, the Cube was calling
description.german: Du konntest nicht aufhören, der Würfel rief dich an
description.french: Tu ne pouvais pas t'arrêter, le Cube t'appelait
description.italian: Non si poteva fermare, il Cube ti chiamava
description.spanish: No podías parar, el Cubo te llamaba
description.schinese: 你不能停下来，血立方体正在叫您
description.russian: Ты не мог остановиться, Куб требовал этого
description.portuguese: Você não poderia parar-se, o Cube foi chamando você
description.polish: Nie można się było zatrzymać, Kostka Cię wołała

description.english: Reveal the truth about William Conway's disappearing
description.german: Enthüllen Sie die Wahrheit über das Verschwinden von William Conway
description.french: Révéler la vérité sur la disparition de William Conway
description.italian: Rivelare la verità sulla scomparsa di William Conway
description.spanish: Revelar la verdad sobre la desaparición de William Conway
description.schinese: 暴露威廉康威消失的秘密吧
description.portuguese: Revelar a verdade sobre o desaparecimento de William Conway
description.polish: Ujawnij prawdę o zniknięciu Williama Conwaya

description.english: I was too scared, I've lost my mind
description.german: Ich hatte zu viel Angst, ich habe den Verstand verloren
description.french: J'avais trop peur, j'ai perdu la tête
description.italian: Ero troppo spaventato, ho perso la mente
description.spanish: Estaba demasiado asustado, he perdido la cabeza
description.schinese: 我太害怕了，我失去了理智
description.russian: Я был слишком напуган и потерял рассудок
description.portuguese: Estava com demasiado medo, eu perdi minha cabeça

description.english: Cure the beast and find out it's secret
description.german: Heilen Sie die Bestie und finden Sie ihr Geheimnis heraus
description.french: Soigner la bête et découvrir son secret
description.italian: Cura la bestia e scoprirlo è segreto
description.spanish: Cura a la bestia y descubre su secreto
description.schinese: 治好野兽，暴露它的秘密吧
description.russian: Излечи монстра и разгадай его секрет
description.portuguese: Curar a besta e aprender seu segredo
description.polish: Uleczyć bestię i odkryć jej tajemnicę

description.english: Touch an object out of bounds in the Apartments
description.french: Toucher un object hors limites dans les Apartements
description.spanish: Toca un objeto fuera de límites en los Apartamentos
description.schinese: 触摸公寓中范围之外的物品
description.russian: Достать книгу из-за пределов игрового пространства в Апартаментах
description.portuguese: Tocar num objecto fora dos limites nos Apartamentos
description.polish: Dotknij obiektu poza granicami w Apartamentach

description.spanish: Envía la cápsula de vuelta sin abrir
description.schinese: 把没有打开的胶囊送回去
description.russian: Отправить капсулу назад не открывая её
description.portuguese: Devolver a cápsula sem a abrir

description.english: Don't use Blood Pistol against spiders
description.french: Ne pas utiliser le pistolet (de sang?) contre les araignées
description.spanish: No uses Blood Pistol contra las arañas
description.schinese: 不对蜘蛛使用鲜血手枪
description.russian: Не использовать пистолет против пауков в Туманном Мире
description.portuguese: Não utilizar a Pistola de Sangue contra aranhas
description.polish: Nie używaj krwawego pistoletu przeciw pająkom

description.english: Take Mist Spider off your head
Cut off all the candles from their candelabrums
